data.description: A simple interface to creating MySQL queries
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I wrote this module simply because I was tired of writing "SELECT
    ... FROM ... JOIN ... WHERE" and I could not find a module that did
    this for me. Root name space is used because I could not find a
    logical parent, this may be from a lack of understanding, or just
    bad searching on my part. I am open to suggestions :).
